items.title: Arianne Torio - Private Instrumental Tutor - Freelance | LinkedIn
items.snippet: My first-grade teacher told me to not be a teacher, So now I coach and teach at multiple music programs in Santa Clara County as well as give private lessons.

metatags.og:description: Music Teacher at Golden Acorn Music LLC · Hello <br>I am a highly passionate, creative professional. I am currently growing Guitar Expression a music education business. Our primary focus is on Guitar education through private and group lessons. The other side of my passion lies in the creation of sublime sounds through sleepless nights of writing, collaborating and performing music. Whether you need guitar lessons, Musical scores, sound recording, instrument repair, or just an artistic fueled conversation i am your guy. · Experience: Golden Acorn Music LLC · Location: Santa Clara · 55 connections on LinkedIn. View Yonas Kameda’s profile on LinkedIn, a professional community of 1 billion members.

metatags.og:description: Headquartered in the most innovative place on earth, SCU is a private Jesuit university in Santa Clara, California, in Silicon Valley. Consistently recognized as one of the top universities in the nation, Santa Clara offers bachelor's, master's, and doctoral degrees through its six colleges.

metatags.og:title: Home3
metatags.og:description: Explore the largest music and dance school in the Bay Area! Offering a diverse range of classes in Sunnyvale and Milpitas, we specialize in piano, voice, violin, drums, flute, and guitar lessons. Ignite your passion for the arts with our ballet, jazz, and hip hop dance classes. Enroll in our acclaimed programs and let your artistic journey begin today. Register now for classes and embrace the rhythm of creativity!Music Lessons & Dance Classes in Sunnyvale, Cupertino, Mountain View, San Jose, Los Altos, Milpitas, Fremont, Santa Clara are offered by VEKSLER ACADEMY of MUSIC & DANCE: music lessons in piano, keyboard, guitar, violin, voice, drums, flute, clarinet, sax, abd dance classes in ballet, jazz, hip hop, tap. Sunnyvale - Milpitas, CA.
